# Scraper




### ðŸ§¾ Example

```js
const scrape = require('scraper-x0')
const scraper =  new scrape("Password");
scraper.news_24().then((c)=>{
    console.log(c)
})
```

#### This returns the below data 
```
[
  {
    header: news header,
    url: ur
  }
 
]
```

## Available Functions
-  playstore(query)
-  news_mathrubhumi()
-  news_bbc()
-  news_manorama()
-  news_asianet()
-  news_24()
-  news_toi()
-  PdfDrive = {
           search(query)
           download(url from search)  
           }
